rdf:Description.dcterms:title: ESR of organic free radicals and human blood in cancer.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: In section A a review has been made of single crystal studies done 1960-1973. This review has been put into tubular form (See Tables 1, 2, 4-9). A critical analysis and INDO calculations of some of the radicals are reported. [...]

La section A consiste et une analyse rétrospective, couvrant la période 1960-73, de la majorité des études par ESR portant sur les "cristaux uniques" (voir les tableaux 1, 2, 4-9). Une analyse critique, impliquant plusieurs calculs "INDO", nous a permis d'expliciter la présence de ces radicaux. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Experimental Medicine.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The importance of the first two formants in the perception of consonants.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: L'intelligibilité et la perception du lieu d'articulation, du mode de production et du voisement furent étudiés dans 17 consonnes avec les voyelles /I/ et /u/ dabs syllabes CV et VC filtrées contenant: 1) le premier et de deuxième formant à un niveau d'entente comfortable; 2) seulement le deuxième formant; 3) seulement le premier formant; 4) les deux formants à un niveau de haute pression sonore. [...]

The intelligibility and perception of place, manner and voicing were studied in 17 consonants with the vowels /I/ and /u/ in filtered CV and VC syllables containing: 1) the first and second formants at a comfortable listening level; 2) the second formant alone; 3) the first formant alone; and 4) both formants at a high sound pressure level. Results indicated: 1) voicing and manner are well perceived when both formants are present at a comfortable listening level, but place errors still occur; 2) the second formant contains important place, manner and voicing information; 3) the first formant contains much less information, being primarily useful for voicing distinctions, with some manner information for plosives; 4) high sound pressure level slightly decreases the accuracy with which place is perceived; 5) intelligibility and perception of the three features vary as a function of the vowel environment and the positions of the consonants; and 6) invariant energy and transitions carry important information for consonant perception.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Human Communication Disorders.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Endotoxin resistance of inbred mouse strains.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The mechanism of natural resistance to endotoxin was studied in inbred strains of mice. Characteristic patterns of sensitivity to lipopolysaccharides (LPS) extracted from strains of S. typhimurium (Keller, SR-ll, M-206) were observed in inbred mouse strains A/J, C57BI/6J, A/HeJ and C3H/HeJ. Toxicity of acetone dried cells was also investigated in A/J and C57BI/6J mice using strains of S. typhimurium with complete (Keller, and M-206) and incomplete (Rb3 and Re) chemotypes. The susceptibility of the mouse strains to S. typhimurium infection did not parallel their sensitivity to endotoxin. The amount of 51Cr-labelled LPS found in the liver of mouse strains A/J, C57BI/6J, A/HeJ, C3H/HeJ was similar during the early stage after endotoxin injection. [...]

Le présent travail avait pour but d'étudier le mécanisme de la résistance naturelle aux endotoxines chez différentes lignées de souris. Durant cette étude, nous avons observé une sensibilité caractéristique vis-à-vis des endotoxines extraites de différentes souches de S. typhimurium (Keller, SR-11 et M-206) chez des souris de lignées A/J, C57B1/6J, A/HeJ et C3H/HeJ. Nous avons aussi examiné chez les souris de lignées A/J et C57BI/6J la toxicité des préparations de cellules séchées à l'acétone provenant de souches de S. typhimurium ayant un type chimique complet (Keller et M-206) ou incomplet (Pb3 et Re). D'autre part la susceptibilité d'une lignée particulière de souris l'infection par S. typhimurium n'indiquait pas nécessairement que cette lignée était sensible aux endotoxines. Des quantités similaires d'endotoxines marquées au 51Cr furent retrouvées dans le foie des souris de lignées A/J, C57BI/6J, A/HeJ et C3H/HeJ, après les premières heures suivant l'injection. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Microbiology and Immunology.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: On the properties of membrane-bound and solubilized acetylcholinesterase.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Some enzymes can show differences in behaviour depending on whether they are in the membrane-bound or solubilized state (allotopy). Acetylcholinesterase, a membrane-bound enzyme, was solubilized from eel electroplaque membranes and the kinetic properties of the two forms were studied. It was found that the Kms for ACh and the extent of the inhibition by excess substrate of membrane-bound and solubilized acetylcholinesterase both differed significantly. Divalent cations (Mg++, Ca++) increased the Vmax of the solubilized enzyme but decreased that of the membrane-bound enzyme. Eserine was a competitive inhibitor of the solubilized enzyme but a non-competitive inhibitor of membrane-bound acetylcholinesterase. The effects of edrophonium, decamethonium and d-tubocurarine on the Km for ACh and the Vmax of both membrane-bound and solubilized acetylcholinesterase were similar. Neither gallamine nor alpha-bungarotoxin had any effects on either state of the enzyme. It is proposed that the observed allotopic effects can be attributed to changes in configuration of the enzyme upon solubilization as well as to the fact that membrane matrices can limit accessibility of the active site to substrate and various other agents.

Certaines différences peuvent être observées dans le comportement de quelques enzymes selon qu'ils se trouvent dans l'état membranaire ou solubilisé (allotopie). L'acétylcholinestérase, un enzyme membranaire, a été solubilisé de membranes de gymnotes, et l'on a étudié les propriétés cinétiques des deux formes. Nous avons trouvé que le Km pour l'acétylcholinestérase et le degré d'inhibition par un excès de substrat d'acétylcholinestérase membranaire et solubilisé différaient tous deux de façon significative. Les cations bivalents (Mg++, Ca++) ont augmenté le Vmax de l'enzyme solubilisé, mais ils ont diminué celui de l'enzyme membranaire. L'éserine a exercé une action d'inhibition compétitive sur l'enzyme solubilisé, mais sur l'acétylcholinestérase membranaire son action d'inhibition a été non-compétitive. L'edrophonium, le décamétonium et la dtubocurarine ont influencé le Km pour l'acétylcholine et le Vmax de l'acétylcholinestérase solubilisé et membranaire de façon parallèle. La gallamine et I'alpha-bungarotoxine n'eurent d'effet ni sur l'acétylcholinestérase membranaire ni sur l'acétylcholinestérase solubilisé. Nous proposons que les effets allotopiques observés sont attribuables à certains changements de la configuration de l'enzyme lorsque celui-ci est solubilisé, ainsi qu'au fait que les matrices membranaires peuvent limiter l'accès du centre actif de l'enzyme aux molécules de substrat ainsi qu'à plusieurs autres agents.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Pharmacology and Therapeutics.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Hemifield differences in visual perception in deaf and hearing subjects.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Dans cette thèse, les résultats d'une recherche sur les différences de latéralité visuelle entre des adolescents sourds et des adolescents entendants, sont présentés. Dans une série de cinq expériences, des stimulus verbaux et non-verbaux ont été presentés par tachistoscope à deux groupes de sujets sourds, différent dans leur méthode primaire de communication, et à deux groupes contrôlés d'entendants. Les sujets entendants ont démontré une dominance du champ visuel droit pour la perception de materiel verbal, et une dominance du champ visuel gauche pour la perception de matériel non-verbal. Les sujets sourds dont le mode de communication comprend l'emploi d'habiletés manuelles et orales n'ont pas démontré de différences de latéralité dans la perception des stimulus utilisés. Les sujets sourds dont le système de communication est exclusivement oral ont démontré un avantage du champ visuel gauche pour la perception de matériel verbal et nonverbal. La discussion des résultats est orientée sur les stratégies de perception spécifiques à la tâche, et sur les implications des données pour les modèles sous-jacents de différentiation cérébrale chez les sourds.

This thesis investigated visual laterality difference in deaf and hearing adolescents. A series of five experiments is reported, in which verbal and nonverbal stimuli were presented tachistoscopically to two groups of deaf subjects, differentiated on the basis of primary communication mode, and to two groups of hearing controls. Hearing subjects exhibited a right visual field superiority for the perception of verbal material, and a left visual field superiority for the perception of nonverbal material. Deaf subjects whose mode of communication involves the combined use of manual and oral skills did not demonstrate laterality differences in recognition for any of the stimuli employed. Deaf subjects whose communication system is exclusively oral showed a left hemifield advantage for the perception of both verbal and nonverbal material. Discussion of the results centered on both task-specific perceptual strategies, and the implications of the findings for underlying patterns of cerebral differentiation in the deaf.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Psychology.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The effect of algal and pectic polyelectrolytes as gastrointestinal binders of lead.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Les composés macromoléculaires dérivés des algues marines et des fruits citriques étaient étudiés pour leur affinité à réagir avec les cations bivalents des métaux. L'étude porta plus spécifiquement sur les cations du plomb et du calcium. Les études des extracts étaient éxecutées in vitro par ultrafiltration et in vivo par la technique des segment intestinaux ligaturés chez des rats. L'efficacité des reactions d'échange des ions avec les cations bivalent s a servi à établir l'ordre d'absorption préférential par une solution poetique, "fucoidan" ou "carrageenan". On a trouvé que le plomb a une grande affinité pour les polyélectrolytes et que le calcium en a très peu. Les études in vivo ont démontré la reduction de 87% de l'absorption du plomb par les rat en utilisant une solution pectique, et de 70% pour une solution "fucoidan" ou "carrageenan". Ces polyeléctrolytes naturels et non-toxiques, sont des agents appropries qui se lieront au plomb mais pas ou très peu au calcium. Cés critériums sont très important pour ses applications biologiques et médicales. La grande activité biologique de ces composes dépend de la position et de la disponibilité des groups fonctionnels pour le processus d'échange d'ions, et de la viscosité de la solution.

Macromolecular compounds derived from marine algae and citrus fruits were studied for their ability to bind divalent metal cations, with specific reference to lead and calcium. Studies were carried out in vitro by ultrafiltration and in vivo by the ligated intestinal loop technique using rats. Using the efficiency of ion-exchange reactions with divalent cations, the order of preferential binding was established for pectate, fucoidan and carrageenan. These polyelectrolytes had the greatest affinity for lead with relatively little binding of calcium. Studies in vivo demonstrated an 87% reduction in the lead absorbed by the rat when using pectate, and 70% with fucoidan and carrageenan. It was concluded that these naturally occurring non-toxic polyelectrolytes are suitable binding agents for lead and that the insignificant binding of calcium is an important criteria for biological and clinical application. The high biological activity of these compounds depends on position and availability of functional groups for the ion-exchange process, and viscosity of the solution.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Experimental Surgery.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Studies with cyclic AMP and a parathyroid hormone-sensitive adenylate cyclase.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Une méthode de dosage de l'adénosine 3', 5'-monophosphate est décrite utilisant une préparation brute, de grande affinité et spécificité, du cortex surrénalien de boeuf. Avec cette procédure il est possible d'analyser de façon reproductible le taux d'AMPc dans l'urine, le plasma et les tissus, et ce, sans purification excessive préalable. Les niveaux d'AMPc présents dans l'urine et le sang d'adultes se sont avérés comparables à ceux rapportés par d'autres, et chez les enfants l'AMPc de l'urine était en relation inverse de l'âge. Des cas de cancers et d'hyperparathyroidisme furent associés à un taux élevé d'AMPc urinaire et de calcium sérique mais la mesure du nucléotide dans l'urine a une faible valeur diagnostique dans l'hypercalcémie. [...]

An assay for adenosine 3', 5'-monophosphate has been described utilizing a crude bovine adrenal cortical preparation with high affinity and specificity. With this method cAMP , could be analyzed reproducibly in urine, plasma and tissues without extensive purification. Levels of cAMP in urine and blood of adults were comparable to values reported by others, in children urinary cAMP was inversely related to age. Hyperparathyroidism and cancer were associated with high urinary cAMP and serum calcium levels. but the measurement of the nucleotide in urine had little diagnostic value in hypercalcemia. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Experimental Medicine.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Onset and development of synaptic activity at an amphibian neuromuscular junction.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: L'étude électrophysiologique du développement de la jonction neuromusculaire du myotome de Xenopus laevis a été effectuée par enregistrement intracellulaire et extracellulaire focalisé. La sensibilite à l'acétylcholine précède le début de l'activité synaptique présumée d'environ une heure. Au cours du développement les potentiels synaptiques deviennent plus courts; de même que l'action de la prostigmine sur leur durée devient plus marquée. La durée des potentiels synaptiques enregistrés sur la synapse mature en presence d'une forte concentration d'anticholinestérase n'est pas aussi longue que celle des potentiels enregistrés à des stades plus précoces, suggérant que le développement de la cholinestérase ne rend pas totalement compte des changéments de durée. La fréquence des MEPP focalisés est multipliée par 14 au cours de la maturation et la quantite d'MPP focal a été estimée être multipliée 100 fois environ. L'effet de l'hypertonicité et d'excès potassique sur la fréquence des MEPP augmente-aussi beaucoup avec l'âge. La signification de ces découvertes sur le développement de la jonction neuromusculaire est discutée.

The electrophysiology of the developing myotomal neuromuscular junction of Xenopus laevis was investigated by intracellular and focal external recording. Sensitivity to acetylcholine preceded the onset of presumptive synaptic activity by about one hour. Synaptic potentials became briefer during development and the effect of proatigmine on their time course became progressively greater. The duration of synaptic potentials recorded at the mature synapse in the presence of high concentrations of anticholinesterases was not as long as that of potentials recorded at early stages, suggesting that the development of cholinesterase does not fully account for the change in duration. The frequency of focal MEPPs increased l4-fold during development and the estimated quantum content of the focal EPP increased about 100-fold. The effects of hypertonicity and excess potassium on MEPP frequency also increased greatly with age. The relevance of these findings to the development of yhe neuromuscular junction ls discussed.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Physiology.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Changes of connotative and denotative meaning associated with aphasia.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The connotation and denotation of words were studied. Seven groups of subjects were included, three groups of children, college students, hospitalized controls, and two groups of aphasies. The results indicated: l) connotation and naming are unrelated; 2) denotation develops systematically with age and deteriorates in a regressive manner in aphasia, 3) intensity of connotative judgements decrease with age, dysfluent aphasies showed significant decreases in polarity and some fluent aphasies demonstrate a regressive polarity, 4) scaled connotative judgement and semantic space do not differ in any consistent manner in relation to age or aphasia. The results demonstrate the need for further research on the relationship between connotation and denotation and on the nature of connotative disorders in aphasia.

Nous avons étudié la connotation et la dénotation de differents mots. La présente étude inclue sept groupes de sujets dont trois groupes d'enfants, des étudiants universitaires, des contrôles hospitalisés et deux groupes d'aphasiques. Les résultats démontrent: 1) il n'existe pas de relation entre la connotation et la dénotation; 2) la dénotation se développe systématiquement avec l'age et se détériore de façon régressive dans l'aphasie; 3) l'intensité des jugements connotatifs décroît avec l'age, les aphasiques dysfluents montrent une baisse significative de la polarité de leurs jugements et quelques aphasiques fluents démontrent une polarité régressive; 4) l'échelle des moyennes des jugements connotatifs et l'espace sémantique ne varient pas de façon particulière en relation avec l'age ou la présence d'aphasie. Les résultats démontrent la nécessité de pousser plus avant la recherche sut les relations entre la connotation et la dénotation et sur la nature des troubles de connotation dans l'aphasie.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Human Communication Disorders.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Studies toward the primary structure of bacteriophage S13 DNA.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: Spleen exonuclease and bacteriophage T4 induced polynucleotide kinase have been characterized with regard to their use in DNA sequence analysis and a model describing the action of polynucleotide kinase proposed. Interfering oligodeoxyribonucleotide-like contaminants in the polynucleotide kinase preparations were characterized and removed. A general method for the determination of the sequence of oligodeoxyribonucleotides of any base composition was developed. This involved partial spleen exonuclease degradation, 5' terminal labelling with polynucleotide kinase and [gamma-32P] ATP, and chain length fractionation of the labelled digest products. Several fractionation systems were compared with regard to their use in this method, in particular, and in DNA sequence analysis, in general. The sequences of long pyrimidine oligonucleotides from S13+ DNA were determined using this and two other methods; these sequences were compared with those from the DNA of bacteriophage OX174, and their significance regarding the evolutionary divergence of these alosely related bacteriophages examined.

L'exonucléase de la rate et la polynucléotide kinase induite par le bacteriophage T4 ont été caractérisées a cause de leur utilité dans l'analyse séquentielle de l'ADN et un modèle décrivant l'action de la polynucléotide kinase est proposé. Des contaminants ressemblant a des oligodéoxyribonucléotides et interférant dans la préparation de la polynucléotide kinase ont été isolés et caractérisés. Une méthode générale est developée pour la détermination de la séquence des oligodéoxyribonucléotides composés de n'importe quelle base. Celle-ci consiste en la dégradation partielle de l'exonucléase de la rate, le marquage du bout 5' de la chaine a l'aide de la polynucléotide kinase et de ATP [Y-32P], et du fractionnement des produits marqués et digerés. Plusieurs séquences de fractionnement ont été comparés en raison de leur utilité dans cette methode en particulier, et dans l'analyse séquentielle de l'ADN en général. Les séquences de longs oligonucléotides pyrimidine de l'ADN du bactériophage S13+ ont été déterminées en utilisant cette methode de même que deux autres; ces séquences ont été comparées à celles de l'ADN du bactériophage OX174 et leur importance en regard de la divergence d'évolution de ces bactériophages étroitement reliés y est examinée.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Biochemistry.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Transport activity and Na+-K+-ATPase of plasma membranes of Ehrlich ascites cells.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: A new procedure has been developed for the rapid, large scale isolation of plasma membranes from Ehrlich ascites cells which is superior to other available methods. The surface charge density of these membranes (60,000 esu cm^-2) is 20 times the value reported for intact cells using different methodology. The Na+-K+-ATPase of these membranes has a low turnover number (2000 min^-1) and a high sensitivity to K+ at low [ATP]. Evidence is presented for the existence of an ATP-generating system in the membranes maintaining a steady state level of ATP of about 50 pmoles mg^-1. In the absence of ion gradients, 2-aminoisobutyric acid (AIB) is accumulated in the membrane vesicles. The vesicular ATP is a potential candidate for energizing this active transport. Ion gradients increased AIB accumulation through specific coupling to the Na+ electrochemical potential difference across the vesicle membrane. Other cations are not required per se. Exchange diffusion was demonstrated using methionine.

Une nouvelle méthode pour l'isolement de la membrane plasmatique de la cellule Ehrlich ascitique a été développée. Celle-ci est supérieure aux méthodes conventionelles. La densité de charges négatives sur les membranes est de 60,000 esu cm^-2; cette valeur est 20 fois celle mesurée dans les cellules intactes avec des techniques différentes. L'activité Na+-K+-ATPasique de ces membranes a un faible taux de "turnover" (2000 min^-1) et une sensibilite éleveé à K+ à de basses concentrations d'ATP. Des preuves sont présentées pour l'existence dans les membranes d'un système qui produit l'ATP et le maintient à un niveau d'environ 50 pmoles mg^-1. En l'abscence de gradients d'ions, l'acide 2-aminoisobutyrique (AIB) est accumulé dans les vésicules que forment les membranes. L'ATP qui se trouve associé à ces membranes peut fournir l'énergie requise pour l'accumulation. Les gradients d'ions augmentent l'accumulation de l'AIB par couplage spécifique à la différence de potentiel électrochimique du Na+ à travers la membrane de la vésicule. D'autres cations ne sont pas requis. L'échange est démontré en utilisant la méthionine.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Biochemistry.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Toneme perception in the Yoruba language
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: La perception des trois tons caractéristiques de la langue Yoruba fut étudiée par quatre groupes différents en ce qui concerne la discrimination, l'identification, ainsi que l'analyse des tons acoustiques qui se présentent dans certains monosyllables Yoruba prononcés par un homme et une femme. Les résultats de cette analyse ont indiqué que, (1) l'expérience est le facteur dominant dans la perception des tons de la langue Yoruba; (2) les tons pouvaient être identifiés avec précision par les quatre groupes isolés; (3) l'environnement phonémique dans lequel les tons sont perçus est un important facteur à leur perception; (4) les tons semblent être perçus par les quatre groupes dépourvus d'expérience antérieure, selon la modalité non-linguistique; (5) les tons graves et aigus ne peuvent être considérés comme tons uniformes; (6) les tons enqlobent toute la syllable; (7) les quatre indications tangibles (fréquence fondamentale, intensité, durée et fréquences phonétiques) observées pour ces tons contribuent collectivement a la differénciation totale entre les tons. Cependant, la comparaison des rapports statistiques suggère que la principale différence des tons était la fréquence fondamentale.

The perception of the three lexical tones in the Yoruba language by four groups of subjects was studied in terms of discrimination, identification, and acoustic analysis of the Yoruba tones as they occur in monosyllabic morphemes uttered by a male and a female speaker. Results indicated that: (1) experience is a dominant factor in the perception of the Yoruba tones; (2) the tones could be accurately identified in isolation by the four groups of listeners; (3) the phonemic environment in which the tones are embedded, is an important factor in their perception; (4) tonemes appear to be processed non-linguistically by the naive listeners; (5) the high end the low tones cannot be considered as level tonemes; (6) the domain of the tones is over the entire syllable and (7) the four physical dues (fundamental frequency, intensity, duration and, formant frequencies) extrapolated for the tonemes contribute collectively to the overall differentiation, among the tones. However, comparison of the statistical ratios suggests that the best single differentiator of the tonemes was the fundamental frequency.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Human Communications Disorders.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Mineralography of contrasting mineralization at Gaspe, Quebec. -.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: In 1921, prospecting near the head waters of the York river in the interior of the Gaspe Peninsula,P.Q. led to the discovery of copper deposits. Since that time considerable geological work has been done in the vicinity of these copper showings. Noranda Mines Ltd. became interested in the economic possibilities of these deposits. This company financed a diamond drill program for the summer months of 1939 and 1940. In 1940, Dr. F.F. Osborne was employed by the Quebec Bureau of Mines to make a detailed examination of the property. Dr. Osborne found these deposits interesting for several reasons. [...] Metallic minerals are of the high temperature type. Most of the mineralization occurs on two adjoining mountains, Needle and Copper. The metallic minerals on Needle mountain differ in composition and concentration from those on Copper mountain. A problem of special interest arises. Dr. Osborne considered a polished section study desirable, in order to obtain information about the paragenesis of the metallic and associated gangue minerals, and the origin and character of the mineralizing solutions. He believed that an explanation for the contrasting mineralization could also be found. The writer was assigned to this problem. The laboratory work and writing of this thesis was done in the Geology Department of McGill University, under the direction of Dr. F.F. Osborne, whose guidance and advice is gratefully acknowledged. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Geology.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The influence of adversity on the career of Henry Wadsworth Longfellow.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: One of the foremost men of American letters is in reality not very well-known to most Americans. This paper has been written in order that the reader may know Longfellow, not only as a man of letters, but also as a human being. Throughout the life of this poet was a shadow of sadness, caused by a series of adversities. In the paper I hope to further a more sympathetic understanding of his life and a deeper appreciation of the literature which was influenced by those trials. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: English.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: High pressure hydrogenation studies of lignin and related materials. --.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: A. A new, simple and efficient method has been devised for the hydrogenation at high pressures, of small quantities of plant material and for the analysis and identification of the hydrogenated products. [...] C. Each of the various groups of ethanolysis products obtained in the ethanolysis of maple wood meal, and including (1) the distillable oils; ( 2) the non-distillable amorphous fraction of the water-soluble oils; (3) the so-called "benzene-shakings"; (4) the non-water-soluble tar; (5) the water-insoluble ethanol lignin and (6) the residual lignin in the wood, have been hydrogenated and the resulting products separated, analyzed and very largely identified. D. Based on these results, and on the previously published data on hydrogenation, the type of linkRge (-C-C- or -C-O-C-) present in the individual fractions and the extent to which these are present, have been determined. E. The experimental data and theoretical consideration would seem to provide a rational working theory of the mechanism of ethanolysis. F. Contrary to general belief, it was found possible to obtain simple water-soluble lignin units by the methanolysis of maple and aspen woods. The water-insoluble methanol lignin (maple) has been hydrogenated and the products shown to be identical with those obtained by hydrogenation of the ethanol lignin (maple). [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Chemistry.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Studies on the determination of thiamine and riboflavin in foods. --.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The vital importance of thiamine as a dietary constituent makes it imperative that rapid and accurate methods should be available for its determination. However until comparatively recently the time-consuming and expensive biological assay has given the most satisfactory results. [...] The short life cycle of micro-organisms favours the development of a rapid method for thiamine. [...] It was evident on examining the literature that the thiochrome method was the most promising for the analysis of foodstuffs with a low thiamine content. The investigations recorded in this thesis are concerned with an attempt to modify the method so as to avoid the use of adsorption procedures to eliminate interfering substances. A modified thiochrome method is proposed which is based on a reinvestigation of the quantitative application of the thiochrome reaction. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Agricultural Chemistry.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The effect of temperature on the sorption of water vapor by cellulosic materials. --.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: On one sample of 'standard cellulose' the isotherms for the sorption of water vapor at different relative vapor pressures, have been established at 20 degree intervals from 0°C to 80°C. These have been determined for both adsorption and desorption. These isotherms have the regular sigmoidal shape and hysteresis is exhibited between the adsorption and desorption curves. It is shown that as the temperature is raised the sorptive power of cellulose toward water decreases and also that the hysteresis decreases, i.e., the desorption and adsorption curves approach one another. The Olausius-Clapeyron relationship bas been applied to these and to "equilibrium" isotherms derived from them to determine the differential heats of wetting of "standard cellulose" at different moisture contents. The isotherms for the sorption of water vapor by sheet "Oellophane" have been determined at 20°C. These have the same general characteristics as the isotherms for natural, fibrous celluloses.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Chemistry.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Faulting and ore deposition in the Rouyn-Bell River region. --.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: This thesis is based in part on field work carried out by the writer during the seasons of 1937 and 1938; and during a brief trip in the winter of 1939. Thirteen of the producing mines were visited. Much useful information relating to the problems dealt with has been obtained from reports by various investigators on the general geology, mineral deposits, and certain intrusive bodies or the region. [...] This thesis is an attempt to assemble, grade, correlate, and plot on a map, all the available information pertaining to faulting in Western Quebec; and, from such a compilation, to draw certain conclusions as to the relations of faulting to the localization of economically important mineral deposits. A study was made to find the relationship between faulting and ore deposition in the Rouyn-Bell River region. The general geology and the distribution of faults are outlined. Faults are then classified as pre-ore and post-ore to suit best the nature of the problem. Following this descriptions are given of many of the major faults, and of the important orebodies of twenty-nine of the mining companies active in the area during the past or at present. The gold deposits are then grouped according to their relation to faults. An important part of the investigation was the compilation, from various sources, of a geological map of the Rouyn-Bell River region on a scale of one mile to the inch, showing the location of many of the mines and major faults. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Geology -- Québec (Province).

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The effect of oxygen on the cyanidation of gold. --.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: One of the important phases of the metallurgical industry is the extraction or the metals from their ores. The greater proportion of the world's gold is recovered by means of the Cyanide Process. The chemical reaction between gold and potassium cyanide has been expressed in the form of a chemical equation known as Elsner's Equation:4Au + 8KCN + 2 H2O +O2 = 4KaU(CN)2 +4KCH This equation emphasizes the necessity of oxygen as a requisite for the above react1on. Throughout the history of gold mining practice, a great deal of experimentation has been done to prove and disprove Elsner's equation; and, to a lesser degree, to determine what effect oxygen has in the dissolution of gold from an ore. [...] The purpose of the present research was to determine the effect of increases in oxygen content of cyanide solution on the rate of solution of gold in cyanide solution, using pure gold foil. Thus, by elimination of all impurities, the effects of the increase in the oxygen could be more easily interpreted. Further it was also hoped that the experiments would indicate what effect the increase in oxygen might have upon the consumption of cyanide in the process. With these ideas in mind, the following work was carried out under the direction of Professor J.U. MacEwan, Professor of Metallurgy. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Mining Engineering.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Madame de Ségur : vie oeuvre et influence sur la littérature enfantine en France. --.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: [...] Quel n'est donc pas le ravissement quand Madame de Sêgur inaugura pour l'enfance, le roman en miniature, le roman lilliputien, - mais actuel et mondain, et sentimental et satirique à l'occasion. Sans se soucier de la galerie, des enfants y vivaient les petites aventures et les petits drames de leur âge. 0, stupeur! on n'y prêchait pas, et la seule morale qui eut voix au chapitre était la morale en action. Chacun récoltait ce que, chemin faisant, il avait semé; comme dans la vie. D'où vient la vogue de Madame de Sêgur qui a duré plus d'un demi-siècle, et n'est pas encore épuisée? De ce qu'elle a su montrer les incomparables réserves de tendresse, de pitié, de dévouement déjà maternelles, qui sont au coeur des futures femmes, et les rivalités et les batailles des futurs hommes. De ce qu'elle a su donner à l'enfance l'intérêt, l'illusion, le monde fictif du roman, de ce qu'elle a su procurer ce délicat plaisir mental qui consiste à se passionner pour où contre des êtres imaginaires, et à leur attribuer ne fut-ce que pendant quelques heures, une émouvante réalité. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Ségur, Sophie, comtesse de, 1799-1874.
FRENCH LITERATURE -- HISTORY AND CRITICISM.
CHILDREN’S LITERATURE.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: The relation between chemical composition of a ration and its feeding value for bacon hogs. --.
rdf:Description.dc:contributor: Department of Animal Nutrition and Breeding
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: This paper reports a study of the relation between the daily gain of bacon hogs from weaning to market weight, and the individual feed fractions of the standard chemical analysis (protein, ether extract, ash, crude fitre, and nitrogen-free extract) as compared to the fractions of the modified scheme proposed by Crampton and Maynard (protein, ether extract, ash, cellulose, lignin, and other carbohydrates). The data was analyzed statisticallv bv two methods,(1) partial regressions using the error variance, and (2) partial correlations using the between-lot variance: The method of partial regression was found to be unsatisfactory for this type of data. Partial correlations were calculated between gain and percent of the feed fractions, independent of level of food intake, negative correlations existed with ether extract, ash, cellulose, and lignin, and positive correlations with protein, nitrogen-free extract and other carbohydrates.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Animal Nutrition and Breeding.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Education in the bloc settlements of western Canada.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: [...] This thesis is a description of the assimilative forces at work within the foreign group settlements of Western Canada, with particular emphasis on the educational factors. Its primary concern is with the role of education as a positive means for promoting the successful fusion of the Old World culture with the New. Therefore the part which educational institutions have played in the past and are playing in the present to effect the smooth, stable assimilation of the peoples within our foreign colonies is described at some length, while a programme for the extension and increased efficiency of these institutions is included. For it is in the interests of our Dominion that the diverse elements of our population merge gradually to develop a new, purely Canadian mentality compounded of the finest contributions of the country1s various national personalities. Education is unquestionably the most effectual catalyst in the process. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Prairie Provinces -- Foreign population.
Minorities -- Education -- Prairie Provinces.
Assimilation (Sociology).

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: I. Cyclization of 1,5-hexadienes. II. Inactivity of bromine in bromecetal. --.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: The study of naturally occurring cyclic compounds is one of the most fascinating chapters in Organic Chemistry. The occurrence of a very large number and many types of cyclic compounds in nature, and their seemingly simple relationship with many straight chain compounds has excited the curiosity of many workers. The logical possibility of a common source of simple units for the synthesis of many large and complex compounds has led to all sorts of speculations. We must however admit that we know virtually nothing about the vital synthesis of even the simplest types of compounds. The plant, let alone the animal, is a very complex type of mechanism. The processes taking place within the plant are so many, and perhaps the energy transfers so different from the types met with in the laboratory, that it is difficult to draw definite conclusions from certain experiments. Thus, because a certain plant on being fed with glucose increases say, its sterol content, it does not mean that the plant took the sugar molecules and so rearranged them that sterols were formed. Nor does it tell us just how those sterols were formed, because during that period the plant was carrying out a thousand and one other processes which were in all probability closely tied up with the formation of the sterols. Although the problem is extremely complicated, we try to make certain observations and draw certain conclusions as regards the origin and biogenesis of plant constituents.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Chemistry.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: An investigation into experimental neurosis and its treatment.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: From the time that Pavlov began using the conditioned reflex method to investigate higher nervous processes in animals, there has been much controversy over the reliability of this procedure. It is hoped that the conditioned reflex method will be further justified in this report, which corroborates the work of other laboratories, and brings forward new material in agreement with results found by other methods of investigation. [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Physiology.

rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Sand culture experiments with spinach. --.
rdf:Description.dc:abstract: [...] Although the exact nutritive value of spinach is an open question at the present time, much interest is being shown in the crop, particularly since the advent of the frozen food industry. As yet very little experimental work dealing with the proper fertilization of spinach has been recorded. Field experimentation would be the logical means of attacking this problem in order to determine the requirements of the crop in situ. However, recommendations based on such trials are only reliable in the district where the actual tests have been made or in districts where conditions are very similar. Goulden (1937) remarks that usually agronomic tests are on soil that is much less subject to variation than the surrounding district so that in general the results from them are probably considered as applicable over too wide an area. Therefore, in order to determine the fundamental requirements of the spinach plant, river washed sand was chosen as a culture medium. A "pot-culture" experiment was designed as a preliminary essay to establish critical levels of nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium in the conducting tissues of the spinach plant by means of foliar symptomatology, yield records, and "quick plant tests." [...]
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Botany-Horticulture.
